abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to strengthen
            the Industrial Bank of Yemen's (IBY) institutional
            capacity to promote, finance and supervise private
            industrial projects. The project consists of three
            components: (a) consultants services and training to improve
            IBY's capacity to prepare, promote, appraise and
            supervise industrial projects, and to assist entrepreneurs
            during their implementation; (b) a pilot component for
            training of industrial managers through overseas short-term
            and on-the-job training courses; and (c) IBY's line of
            credit to provide part of IBY's foreign exchange
            resource requirements during the 1985 and 1986 period.
